GetOperations.Name: Get
GetOperations.Description: Retrieves the properties of an existing Azure Cosmos DB database account.

CreateOperations.Name: CreateOrUpdate
CreateOperations.Description: Creates or updates an Azure Cosmos DB database account. The "Update" method is preferred when performing updates on an account.

UpdateOperations.Name: Update
UpdateOperations.Description: Updates the properties of an existing Azure Cosmos DB database account.

DeleteOperations.Name: Delete
DeleteOperations.Description: Deletes an existing Azure Cosmos DB database account.

ListOperations.Name: GetAll
ListOperations.Description: Lists all the Azure Cosmos DB database accounts available under the given resource group.

OperationsFromSubscriptionExtension.Name: GetCosmosDBAccounts
OperationsFromSubscriptionExtension.Description: Lists all the Azure Cosmos DB database accounts available under the subscription.

OperationsFromSubscriptionExtension.Name: CheckNameExistsDatabaseAccount
OperationsFromSubscriptionExtension.Description: Checks that the Azure Cosmos DB account name already exists. A valid account name may contain only lowercase letters, numbers, and the '-' character, and must be between 3 and 50 characters.

OtherOperations.Name: FailoverPriorityChange
OtherOperations.Description: Changes the failover priority for the Azure Cosmos DB database account. A failover priority of 0 indicates a write region. The maximum value for a failover priority = (total number of regions - 1). Failover priority values must be unique for each of the regions in which the database account exists.

OtherOperations.Name: GetKeys
OtherOperations.Description: Lists the access keys for the specified Azure Cosmos DB database account.

OtherOperations.Name: GetConnectionStrings
OtherOperations.Description: Lists the connection strings for the specified Azure Cosmos DB database account.

OtherOperations.Name: OfflineRegion
OtherOperations.Description: Offline the specified region for the specified Azure Cosmos DB database account.

OtherOperations.Name: OnlineRegion
OtherOperations.Description: Online the specified region for the specified Azure Cosmos DB database account.

OtherOperations.Name: GetReadOnlyKeys
OtherOperations.Description: Lists the read-only access keys for the specified Azure Cosmos DB database account.

OtherOperations.Name: RegenerateKey
OtherOperations.Description: Regenerates an access key for the specified Azure Cosmos DB database account.

OtherOperations.Name: GetMetrics
OtherOperations.Description: Retrieves the metrics determined by the given filter for the given database account.

OtherOperations.Name: GetUsages
OtherOperations.Description: Retrieves the usages (most recent data) for the given database account.

OtherOperations.Name: GetMetricDefinitions
OtherOperations.Description: Retrieves metric definitions for the given database account.

OtherOperations.Name: GetMetricsDatabases
OtherOperations.Description: Retrieves the metrics determined by the given filter for the given database account and database.

OtherOperations.Name: GetUsagesDatabases
OtherOperations.Description: Retrieves the usages (most recent data) for the given database.

OtherOperations.Name: GetMetricDefinitionsDatabases
OtherOperations.Description: Retrieves metric definitions for the given database.

OtherOperations.Name: GetMetricsCollections
OtherOperations.Description: Retrieves the metrics determined by the given filter for the given database account and collection.

OtherOperations.Name: GetUsagesCollections
OtherOperations.Description: Retrieves the usages (most recent storage data) for the given collection.

OtherOperations.Name: GetMetricDefinitionsCollections
OtherOperations.Description: Retrieves metric definitions for the given collection.

OtherOperations.Name: GetMetricsCollectionRegions
OtherOperations.Description: Retrieves the metrics determined by the given filter for the given database account, collection and region.

OtherOperations.Name: GetMetricsDatabaseAccountRegions
OtherOperations.Description: Retrieves the metrics determined by the given filter for the given database account and region.

OtherOperations.Name: GetMetricsPercentileSourceTargets
OtherOperations.Description: Retrieves the metrics determined by the given filter for the given account, source and target region. This url is only for PBS and Replication Latency data

OtherOperations.Name: GetMetricsPercentileTargets
OtherOperations.Description: Retrieves the metrics determined by the given filter for the given account target region. This url is only for PBS and Replication Latency data

OtherOperations.Name: GetMetricsPercentiles
OtherOperations.Description: Retrieves the metrics determined by the given filter for the given database account. This url is only for PBS and Replication Latency data

OtherOperations.Name: GetMetricsCollectionPartitionRegions
OtherOperations.Description: Retrieves the metrics determined by the given filter for the given collection and region, split by partition.

OtherOperations.Name: GetMetricsCollectionPartitions
OtherOperations.Description: Retrieves the metrics determined by the given filter for the given collection, split by partition.

OtherOperations.Name: GetUsagesCollectionPartitions
OtherOperations.Description: Retrieves the usages (most recent storage data) for the given collection, split by partition.

OtherOperations.Name: GetMetricsPartitionKeyRangeIds
OtherOperations.Description: Retrieves the metrics determined by the given filter for the given partition key range id.

OtherOperations.Name: GetMetricsPartitionKeyRangeIdRegions
OtherOperations.Description: Retrieves the metrics determined by the given filter for the given partition key range id and region.

GetOperations.Description: Gets the Graph resource under an existing Azure Cosmos DB database account with the provided name.

GetOperations.Name: Get
GetOperations.Description: Get the properties of a managed Cassandra cluster.

CreateOperations.Name: CreateOrUpdate
CreateOperations.Description: Create or update a managed Cassandra cluster. When updating, you must specify all writable properties. To update only some properties, use PATCH.

UpdateOperations.Name: Update
UpdateOperations.Description: Updates some of the properties of a managed Cassandra cluster.

DeleteOperations.Name: Delete
DeleteOperations.Description: Deletes a managed Cassandra cluster.

ListOperations.Name: GetAll
ListOperations.Description: List all managed Cassandra clusters in this resource group.

OperationsFromSubscriptionExtension.Name: GetCassandraClusters
OperationsFromSubscriptionExtension.Description: List all managed Cassandra clusters in this subscription.

OtherOperations.Name: InvokeCommand
OtherOperations.Description: Invoke a command like nodetool for cassandra maintenance

OtherOperations.Name: GetBackups
OtherOperations.Description: List the backups of this cluster that are available to restore.

OtherOperations.Name: GetBackup
OtherOperations.Description: Get the properties of an individual backup of this cluster that is available to restore.

OtherOperations.Name: Deallocate
OtherOperations.Description: Deallocate the Managed Cassandra Cluster and Associated Data Centers. Deallocation will deallocate the host virtual machine of this cluster, and reserved the data disk. This won't do anything on an already deallocated cluster. Use Start to restart the cluster.

OtherOperations.Name: Start
OtherOperations.Description: Start the Managed Cassandra Cluster and Associated Data Centers. Start will start the host virtual machine of this cluster with reserved data disk. This won't do anything on an already running cluster. Use Deallocate to deallocate the cluster.

OtherOperations.Name: Status
OtherOperations.Description: Gets the CPU, memory, and disk usage statistics for each Cassandra node in a cluster.

GetOperations.Name: Get
GetOperations.Description: Get the properties of a managed Cassandra data center.

CreateOperations.Name: CreateOrUpdate
CreateOperations.Description: Create or update a managed Cassandra data center. When updating, overwrite all properties. To update only some properties, use PATCH.

UpdateOperations.Name: Update
UpdateOperations.Description: Update some of the properties of a managed Cassandra data center.

DeleteOperations.Name: Delete
DeleteOperations.Description: Delete a managed Cassandra data center.

ListOperations.Name: GetAll
ListOperations.Description: List all data centers in a particular managed Cassandra cluster.

GetOperations.Name: Get
GetOperations.Description: Gets information about a mongo cluster.

CreateOperations.Name: CreateOrUpdate
CreateOperations.Description: Create or update a mongo cluster. Update overwrites all properties for the resource. To only modify some of the properties, use PATCH.

UpdateOperations.Name: Update
UpdateOperations.Description: Updates an existing mongo cluster. The request body can contain one to many of the properties present in the normal mongo cluster definition.

DeleteOperations.Name: Delete
DeleteOperations.Description: Deletes a mongo cluster.

ListOperations.Name: GetAll
ListOperations.Description: List all the mongo clusters in a given resource group.

OperationsFromSubscriptionExtension.Name: GetMongoClusters
OperationsFromSubscriptionExtension.Description: List all the mongo clusters in a given subscription.

OtherOperations.Name: GetConnectionStrings
OtherOperations.Description: List mongo cluster connection strings. This includes the default connection string using SCRAM-SHA-256, as well as other connection strings supported by the cluster.

GetOperations.Name: Get
GetOperations.Description: Gets information about a mongo cluster firewall rule.

CreateOperations.Name: CreateOrUpdate
CreateOperations.Description: Creates a new firewall rule or updates an existing firewall rule on a mongo cluster.

UpdateOperations.Name: Update
UpdateOperations.Description: Creates a new firewall rule or updates an existing firewall rule on a mongo cluster.

DeleteOperations.Name: Delete
DeleteOperations.Description: Deletes a mongo cluster firewall rule.

ListOperations.Name: GetAll
ListOperations.Description: List all the firewall rules in a given mongo cluster.

GetOperations.Name: Get
GetOperations.Description: Gets a private endpoint connection.

CreateOperations.Name: CreateOrUpdate
CreateOperations.Description: Approve or reject a private endpoint connection with a given name.

UpdateOperations.Name: Update
UpdateOperations.Description: Approve or reject a private endpoint connection with a given name.

DeleteOperations.Name: Delete
DeleteOperations.Description: Deletes a private endpoint connection with a given name.

ListOperations.Name: GetAll
ListOperations.Description: List all private endpoint connections on a Cosmos DB account.

GetOperations.Name: Get
GetOperations.Description: Gets the private link resources that need to be created for a Cosmos DB account.

ListOperations.Name: GetAll
ListOperations.Description: Gets the private link resources that need to be created for a Cosmos DB account.

GetOperations.Name: Get
GetOperations.Description: Retrieves the properties of an existing Azure Cosmos DB restorable database account.  This call requires 'Microsoft.DocumentDB/locations/restorableDatabaseAccounts/read/*' permission.

ListOperations.Name: GetAll
ListOperations.Description: Lists all the restorable Azure Cosmos DB database accounts available under the subscription and in a region.  This call requires 'Microsoft.DocumentDB/locations/restorableDatabaseAccounts/read' permission.

OperationsFromSubscriptionExtension.Name: GetRestorableCosmosDBAccounts
OperationsFromSubscriptionExtension.Description: Lists all the restorable Azure Cosmos DB database accounts available under the subscription. This call requires 'Microsoft.DocumentDB/locations/restorableDatabaseAccounts/read' permission.

OtherOperations.Name: GetRestorableSqlDatabases
OtherOperations.Description: Show the event feed of all mutations done on all the Azure Cosmos DB SQL databases under the restorable account.  This helps in scenario where database was accidentally deleted to get the deletion time.  This API requires 'Microsoft.DocumentDB/locations/restorableDatabaseAccounts/.../read' permission

OtherOperations.Name: GetRestorableSqlContainers
OtherOperations.Description: Show the event feed of all mutations done on all the Azure Cosmos DB SQL containers under a specific database.  This helps in scenario where container was accidentally deleted.  This API requires 'Microsoft.DocumentDB/locations/restorableDatabaseAccounts/.../read' permission

OtherOperations.Name: GetAllRestorableSqlResourceData
OtherOperations.Description: Return a list of database and container combo that exist on the account at the given timestamp and location. This helps in scenarios to validate what resources exist at given timestamp and location. This API requires 'Microsoft.DocumentDB/locations/restorableDatabaseAccounts/.../read' permission.

OtherOperations.Name: GetRestorableMongoDBDatabases
OtherOperations.Description: Show the event feed of all mutations done on all the Azure Cosmos DB MongoDB databases under the restorable account.  This helps in scenario where database was accidentally deleted to get the deletion time.  This API requires  'Microsoft.DocumentDB/locations/restorableDatabaseAccounts/.../read' permission

OtherOperations.Name: GetRestorableMongoDBCollections
OtherOperations.Description: Show the event feed of all mutations done on all the Azure Cosmos DB MongoDB collections under a specific database.  This helps in scenario where container was accidentally deleted.  This API requires 'Microsoft.DocumentDB/locations/restorableDatabaseAccounts/.../read' permission

OtherOperations.Name: GetAllRestorableMongoDBResourceData
OtherOperations.Description: Return a list of database and collection combo that exist on the account at the given timestamp and location. This helps in scenarios to validate what resources exist at given timestamp and location. This API requires 'Microsoft.DocumentDB/locations/restorableDatabaseAccounts/.../read' permission.

OtherOperations.Name: GetRestorableGremlinDatabases
OtherOperations.Description: Show the event feed of all mutations done on all the Azure Cosmos DB Gremlin databases under the restorable account. This helps in scenario where database was accidentally deleted to get the deletion time. This API requires 'Microsoft.DocumentDB/locations/restorableDatabaseAccounts/.../read' permission

OtherOperations.Name: GetRestorableGremlinGraphs
OtherOperations.Description: Show the event feed of all mutations done on all the Azure Cosmos DB Gremlin graphs under a specific database. This helps in scenario where container was accidentally deleted. This API requires 'Microsoft.DocumentDB/locations/restorableDatabaseAccounts/.../read' permission

OtherOperations.Name: GetRestorableGremlinResources
OtherOperations.Description: Return a list of gremlin database and graphs combo that exist on the account at the given timestamp and location. This helps in scenarios to validate what resources exist at given timestamp and location. This API requires 'Microsoft.DocumentDB/locations/restorableDatabaseAccounts/.../read' permission.

OtherOperations.Name: GetRestorableTables
OtherOperations.Description: Show the event feed of all mutations done on all the Azure Cosmos DB Tables. This helps in scenario where table was accidentally deleted. This API requires 'Microsoft.DocumentDB/locations/restorableDatabaseAccounts/.../read' permission

OtherOperations.Name: GetRestorableTableResources
OtherOperations.Description: Return a list of tables that exist on the account at the given timestamp and location. This helps in scenarios to validate what resources exist at given timestamp and location. This API requires 'Microsoft.DocumentDB/locations/restorableDatabaseAccounts/.../read' permission.

GetOperations.Name: Get
GetOperations.Description: Gets the status of service.

CreateOperations.Name: CreateOrUpdate
CreateOperations.Description: Creates a service.

UpdateOperations.Name: Update
UpdateOperations.Description: Creates a service.

DeleteOperations.Name: Delete
DeleteOperations.Description: Deletes service with the given serviceName.

ListOperations.Name: GetAll
ListOperations.Description: Gets the status of service.
